title: Duo to push to plat (also can be a clash mid laner add for more info)
body: Currently low gold ish, I want someone dedicated and reliable who focuses on the match wholeheartedly and makes complaints after the match not in it, thanks, add foxilite.

replies.body: Played with her before. Can confirm she's good and enjoyable to play with :)
WOW REALLY TY <3 did you name change?
